title: What would happen if the polar ice caps melted causing the whole world to become completely submerged underwater? - Quora

response.answer_text: Where did you get “the whole world to become completely submerged underwater” ? The whole world would NOT be submerged. Please actually listen to what is being said. What will be submerged is shorelines, deltas and low lying land. So most of the world’s major cities from London, New York, Los Angeles, Seattle, San Jose, San Diego, St Louis, Shanghai, Bangkok, Saigon etc, the Nile delta which is most of fertile Egypt, the Netherlands, most of Bangladesh, much of Thailand, half of Florida, good chunk of Louisiana, large chunk of Texas, the Mekong Delta, large parts of the Amazon, Congo, Niger, Denmark, Finland, Sweden, Northern and Eastern Germany, Normandy, the Baltic countries, Java, Romania, Iraq, Kuwait and Arab Emirates… Wonder where all those people are going to go? Wonder where all the food is going to come from to replace all the lost land and land damaged by storms and salt water intrusion?
